Translations.Text: £uôeS ay tella tmusni n yimir. Ur d iteffe$ uzway si txeddact is, ur treffed nnta tadist, ur tepparew, siwa ma Iéôa. Ass ideg ar asen Isiwel: "anda ten icriken iW"? A d inin: "ad aK nini, ur illi garane$ unagi
Iooa ten wayen u$uô pnujun zik. Fehmen, ur asen illi ssôan
Ur ifeccel ara umdan di tuppra n lxiô. Ma inul it lqeôê, ad iayes, ad innu$ben

Ma Nseêess as aêunu nne£, deffir ccqa i t iêuzan, war ccekk, ad yini: "ayagi inu. Ur cukke$ ara imir a d ias. Ma bbwve$ s afus n Mass iw, ad afe$ $uôeS ûûam". Ih, a Nbeggen ayen xedmen, i wid ijehlen, u, ih, ad Nsâaddi fellasen aâaqeb iwaâôen
Ma N$at amdan ad iwexxeô, izzi akin. Ma iêuza t lêif, ad ipnuju, irennu
Ini: "tmeyyzem ma iusa d s$uô Öebbi, u kunwi tnekôem t"? Anwa innetlafen sennig win illan di ticuîna tu$miqt
Ad asen Nessken issekniyen nne£ di tmurt akked igenwan, u deg iman nnsen, alamma pputebbten ar neppa d tidep. Day ur Iqadd ara Mass ik mi Neppa, war ccekk, d Anagi n yal cci
Day, s tidep, cukken timlilit d Mass nnsen? Day Neppa, s tidep, ur Izzi ara i yal cci
Ëm
Âsq
Akka i Iweêêa i keçç, akked wid ik id izwaren, Öebbi, Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Neppa, d Aâlayen, d Ameqwôahan
Qôib ad ccergen igenwan seg ixfawen nnsen, mara d lhint lmalayek deg usbuccaâ s ccekôan n Mass nnsent, u ssuturent ad pwassemêen kra illan di tmurt. War ccekk, Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Wid irran imawlan, war Neppa, Iquôaâ ten Öebbi. Ur telliv, keçç, d awkil nnsen
Akka ay k n Nweêêa Leqwôan, s taâôabt, iwakken a pnedôev tayimmap n temdinin, akked wayen i s d izzin; a pnedôev af ass n temlilit, ur degs ccekk; arbaâ di Loennet, arbaâ deg ujajiê
Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, yili Izdukkel iten d yiwen n lois. Maca, ad Issekcem win i S ihwan ar uêunu S. Imednas, ur sâin bab ne$ asettaô
Ne$ rran imawlan, war Neppa. Öebbi d Neppa ay d Bab, d Neppa i Issidiren lmeggtin, d Neppa i Izemren i yal cci
Ayen akw i$ef temgarradem, aêuddu s ar Öebbi. Akka Öebbi, Mass iw; fellaS ppekle$, $eô Neppa ay steôoiâe
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan. Seg iman nnwen Irra yawen tiyugiwin; si lmal nnwen, tiyugiwin. Isfukti kwen yisent. Ur illi wayen i T icban. Neppa Issel, Ipwali
IneS tisura n tmurt akked igenwan. Issugut ôôeéq i win i S ihwan, Iwezzen. Ih, Neppa Issen yal cci

Issers awen d, di ddin, ayen i$ef Iweûûa Nuê. Ayen i k Nweêêa, d ayen i$ef Nweûûa Ibôahim, Musa, akked Âisa: "sbeddet ddin, ur ppemgarradet fellas". èÈÈéay, i imcurak, wayen u$uô la ten tneccdev. Öebbi Ippawi $uôeS, win i S ihwan; Inehhu $uôeS, win isteôoiâen
Ur mfaôaqen armi ten id tusa tussna. Ppemvuddun. Lemmer ur d izwar wawal s$uô Mass ik $ef lmijal ipwassnen, yili myefran. Ih, wid iweôten Tazmamt deffir sen, haaten, fellas, di ccekk imcebbwel

Ilmend n waya, enced, ssewqem akken i tepwamôev, ur teddu d cchawi nnsen. Ini: "umne$ s wayen id Issader Öebbi n Tira. Pwamôe$ d ad wezne$ garawen. Öebbi d Mass nne$, u d Mass nnwen. I nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Ur teppili nnmara garane$. Öebbi ad a$ Issemlil. Tu$alin $uôeS
Wid ipnamaren af Öebbi, deffir wagwav n loawab $uôsen, ur teswi nnmara nnsen, ar Mass nnsen. Fellasen zzâaf, fellasen aâaqeb uqsiê
Öebbi id Issadren Tazmamt, s tidep, akked lmizan. W ad ak imlen, ahat imir iqeôb ed
Ëaren $uôes wid ur numin ara yis. Ma d wid iumnen, ugaden t; éôan ar neppa d tidep. Ih, wid icukken deg imir, haaten, war ccekk, di ttelfan u$miq
Öebbi d Laîif i imdanen iS. Ip$iti win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uohid, d Uzmir
Win ib$an tayerza n laxeôt, ad as Nernu di tyerza ines. Win ib$an tayerza n ddunit, ad as Nefk segs. Ur as illi umur di laxeôt
Ne$ sâan icriken, sse$ôen ten di ddin ur Iqbil Öebbi? Lemmer ur d izwir ara wawal n ufraz, a p fru garasen. I imednas, war ccekk, aâaqeb aqeôêan

A pwaliv imednas feqâen ilmend n wayen kesben, u neppa iddehm ed fellasen. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad ilin di tebêirin n leonanat. Nnsen i sen ihwan $uô Mass nnsen. D wagi ay d lfevl ameqwôan

D wagi is Ipbecciô Öebbi imdanen iS, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiât, af waya, siwa lmaênana i llezm nnwen". Win ixedmen ise$, ad as Nernu degs lehhu. Öebbi, ih, Ipsemmiê, Ippara tajmilt
Ne$ a d inin: "isnulfa d tikerkas af Öebbi". Ma ihwa yaS i Öebbi, ad Icemmaâ ul ik. S wawal iS, ad Isqucc Öebbi tikerkas, ad Iêeqqeq tidep. Ih, Neppa Iéôa tababnit n idmaren
D Neppa i Iqeblen nndama n yimdanen iS. Ipsemmiê tucmitin. Issen ayen txeddmem
Issemêas i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. I ijehliyen, aâaqeb uqsiê
Ma Issuget Öebbi l$it i imdanen iS, ad be$wven di tmurt. Maca, Issrusu d, s lmizan, ayen i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Ippuxebbeô $ef imdanen iS, Ipwali ten
D Neppa id Isse$layen ageffur mara aysen. Iweppaâ aêunu S. Neppa d Bab, d Amaâzuz
Seg issekniyen iS, lxelq n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan n lewêuc, degsen. Izmer Neppa, ma ihwa yaS, a ten id Issemlil
Kra n tiyta ikwen iwwten, siwa ayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen. Aîas i Ipsemmiê
Ur tezmirem a ppesfunngem di tmurt. Ur awen illi, war Öebbi, bab ne$ asettaô
Seg issekniyen iS, ssfinat di yill, amzun d idurar
Ma ihwa yaS ad Issens avu, ad êebsent, d tusbivin sufella s. War ccekk, ayagi d issekniyen i yal aûebôi isnemmiren
Ne$ a ten Issenger ilmend n wayen kesben. Aîas i Ipsemmiê
Ad éôen wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, ar ur asen illi ssôan
Ayen akw i wen ippunefken n wayla, d zzhu n tmeddurt di ddunit. Ayen illan ar Öebbi, yif it; ad idum kteô, i wid iumnen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
wid ijunben ibekkaven ibararen, akked lâaô, u ssurufen i wid i ten isserfan
wid id ipjawaben i Mass nnsen, péallan, ppemcawaôen $ef lameô nnsen, pseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at
wid, ma iusa ten lbe$wv, ad qablen
Aqeîîi n tucmip, d tucmip i p icban. Win isemmêen, issweqmen, arraz is ar Öebbi. Neppa, ih, ur Iêemmel ara imednas
Ma d wid id irran ppaô mi pwadensen, ur telli tiyta degsen
Tiyta, kan, deg wid ivuôôen imdanen, iqehôen di tmurt, war ssebba. I wigi, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Ma d win iûebôen, isemmêen, ayagi, s tidep, d aseyyi n lumuô
Win Itlef Öebbi, ur isâi bab, deffir eS. A pwaliv imednas, mara éôen aâaqeb, ad inin: "ma illa ubrid n tu$alin

A ten twaliv pwafessren fellas, ndellen, ggaren tiî s tugwdi. Ad inin wid iumnen: "imexsuôen, s tidep, d wid i sxesôen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". War ccekk, deg uâaqeb imezgi, ara yilin imednas
Ur asen llin imawlan, ara ten isellken, war Öebbi. Win Itlef Öebbi, ur isâi abrid
Jawbet i Mass nnwen, uqbel a d ias, s$uô Öebbi, ass ur nepwexxiô. Ur awen ippili ssôan assen, ur tezmirem a pnekôem
Ma numren, ur k id Nuzen ara d amêareb nnsen. Ay fellak, siwa timenna. Ih, mara Nesêess i umdan aêunu s$uône£, ad ifôeê yis. Mara t tsami tucmip, id bbwin ifassen is, s tidep, amdan ad ikaraâ
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Ippak nnta i win i S ihwan, Ippak ddkeô i win i S ihwan
Ne$ Ipcarak ddkeô d nnta. Isaâqaô win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Issen, Izmer
Ur ippunefk ara i umdan, ad as Immeslay Öebbi, siwa aweêêi, ne$ deffir ucembir, ne$ a d iazen amazan iwumi ara Iweêêi, s tsriê iS, ayen Ib$a. Ih, Neppa d Aâlayen, d Bab n ûûwab
Akka ik d Nweêêa ôôuê, si lameô nne£; ur telliv d win issnen d acu p Tezmamt, ne$ liman. Maca, nerra p d tafat. Yis Nenehhu win i £ ihwan, seg imdanen nne£. Ih, d Keçç i ippawin d ubrid uwqim
abrid n Öebbi, i Isâan i illan di tmurt, i illan deg igenwan. War ccekk, ar Öebbi ay teddun lumuô

S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nerra p d Leqwôan s taâôabt, amar a pfehmem
Neppa, ih, ata $uône£, ar Tyimmap n Tezmamt, d aâlayan, d uûwib
Day a kwen Nêewwej seg usmekti, imi kunwi d agdud ipêawalen
Acêal id Nuzen d nnbi i imezwura
Ur ten id ippas nnbi, mebla ma mmaâlken fellas
Nemêa wid i ten yifen tazmert. U iûaô umedya imezwura
Ma testeqûav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan"? A d inin, war ccekk: "Ixelq iten Uzmir, Amusnaw
i wen Irran tamurt d dduê; i wen Igan, degs, iberdan - amendeô ma a ppeppwanhum
id Isse$layen, seg igenni, aman s lmizan - Nessakway yissen tamurt immuten; akka ara d tekkrem
id Ixelqen akw tiyugiwin, i wen Ifkan, si sfinat akked lmal, ara trekbem
A pâanncem $ef iârar nnsen; sinna, a d tesmektim l$it n Mass nnwen, mara pâanncem fellasen. A ppinim: "gedha s Win i d Inuben fella$ s waya, ur t nemlik
Ih, a nu$al ar Mass nne
Ëesben ay T iâabden d amur segS. Amdan, s tidep, d anekkaô n ûûeê
Ne$ day d Iddem tullas seg wayen Ixleq, u Ifren awen d arrac
Ma ibbwev ed usali yiwen segsen, $ef wayen id ifka d amedya i Uênin, ad yibrik wudem is, ad ikkufer
ayen d ikren di rrêuê, ur nessifrir anamer
Ëesben lmalayek, i illan d ixdimen n Uênin, d nnta. Day êevôen i uxlaq nnsent? Tira $ef ccada nnsen; fellasen asteqsi
Nnan: "lemmer Irad Uênin, yili ur ten naâbbid". Ur sâin kra n tmusni $ef waya. Nitni la pxeôôiven kan
Ne$ Nefka yasen Tazmamt, uqbel Tagi, d$a, degs, îîfen
Xaîi! Nnan: "nufa d, ih, imezwura nne$, di laâqida. D$a, nekwni, Nedda di lateô nnsen
Am akka, ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddaô ar temdint, mebla ma nnan isâiyen is: "nufa d imezwura nne$ di laâqida. D$a, nedda d lateô nnsen
Inna: "i ma bbwi$ awen d nnhaya yifen tin id tufam ar imezwura nnwen"? Nnan: "nekwni, ihi, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggâam
Nerra d ppaô, segsen. Muqel amek tevôa d inekkaôen
Mi inna Ibôahim i baba s, akked ugdud is: "nek, ur pkka$ deg wayen la tâabdem
kkes ed Win iyi d Ixelqen. D Neppa, s tidep, ara iyi Inhun
Irra t d awal imezgi i texlift is, amar a d u$alen s abrid
U £ate$ ten, nitni akked imezwura nnsen, armi ten id tusa tidep, akked umazan ipbegginen
Mi ten id tusa tidep, nnan: "wagi d ssêur, ihi, nekwni nugi t
Nnan: "A lemmer id ssadren Leqwôan agi ar urgaz ameqwôaêan n snat temdinin

Day d nitni i ifeôôqen aêunu n Mass ik? D Nekwni i sen Ifeôôqen tamâict nnsen, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u Nessuli kra segsen, tidekkaôin sennig wiyav, iwakken kra, ad sxedmen wiyav. Aêunu n Mass ik yif ayen jemâan
Lemmer maççi yiwen n lois kan ara yilin imdanen, a Nerr tiseddura n lfeîîa i ixxamen n wid inekôen Aênin, akw i tiseddaôin i$ef ara alin
i ixxamen nnsen, tibbura; imîeôêen ideg ara élen
akked uzewweq. Maca, ayagi akw, d astumen i tmeddurt n ddunit. Laxeôt, ar Mass ik, i wid ipêezziben
Win iooan asmekti n Uênin, ad as Nqelled Cciîan, ad as yili d amsaâef
Ih, Nitni veôôifen ten seg ubrid, u $ilen ar nitni pwanhan
Alamma ma iusa d $uône£, inna d: "ah, awufan gari yidek, amecwaô illan ger ugmuv d wayev". A yir amsaâef
Ur kwen infaâ, assa, d awez$i, ma tdensem. Aql akwen tcerkem aâaqeb
Day a pperrev, keçç, aâeééug ad issel, ne$ a ppenhuv ader$al, akked win illan di ttelfan n ûûeê
Amar a k id Nekkes, d$a a d Nerr ppaô segsen
ne$ ak Nessken ayen i sen d Nhegga. £uône£, ih, adabu fellasen
Ïîef deg wayen i k d ippuweêêan. Keçç, war ccekk, aql ak deg ubrid uwqim
Wagi, ih, d asmekti i keçç, akked ugdud ik; deqqal fellawen asteqsi
Steqsi wid id Nuzen, uqbel ik, seg imazanen nne£. Day Nerra, war Aênin, iôebbiten ara âabden
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa s issekniyen nne£, ar Ferâun akked imvebbôen is. Inna: "nek d amazan n Mass imavalen
Mi sen d ibbwi issekniyen nne£, nitni la ppavsan degsen
Ur asen Nessenâata assekni, siwa ma i$leb gma s. Nesâadda fellasen aâaqeb, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Nnan: "a yaseêêar, nâaô a$ Mass ik, s lemâahda i k Ifka. Nekwni ara nepwanhu
Mi Nessafer aâaqeb fellasen, imiren ad xedâan
Imdeê Ferâun i ugdud is, inna: "a yagdud iw, day maççi inu tagelda n Maseô, akked isaffen agi, i ippazalen seddaw i. Day ur twalam ara
Ne$ nek ur ife$ ara imdelli agi, ur nezmir ad ibeggen
Acimi ur as qqnen ara imeqyasen n uwôe$, ne$ ur d usint ara yides lmalayek, pwazdan t
Issefqaâ agdud is. Unzen as. Wigi, ih, d agdud ucmit
Mi £ zzaâfen, Nerra d ppaô segsen, Ne$meq iten meôôa
Nerra ten d asmekti u d amedya, i ineggura
Mi sen d ippunefk mmi s n Meryem, d amedya, agdud ik iugwi t
Qqaôen: "ppif iôebbiten nne$, ne$ Neppa"? Qqaôen ak d akka, i nnmara. Ih, nitni d agdud ipmeôéan
Neppa d amdan kan. N$at it, Nerra t d amedya i At Isôail
Lemmer i£ £ ihwi, a Nerr lmalayek di tmurt, deg umkan nnwen
Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciîan! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n ûûeê
Mi n iusa Âisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uôwen s ûûwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, êezzbet i Öebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Öebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, âabdet eÏ, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uâaqeb n wass aqeôêan
Day a pôaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iêbiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipêezziben
A yimdanen iW, assa, ur telli tugdi fellawen, ur $webblet
Wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, u llan d imvuâen
Kecmet Loennet, kunwi akked tlawin nnwen, a ppezhum
Ad asen ddewwiôen, s sniwat n uwôe$, akked ibuqalen; degsen ayen cihwant teôwiêin, ayen iqennâen allen. Kunwi, din, ad twekkôem
D tagi ay d Loennet i tweôtem, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Degs, i kunwi, aîas n izwayen, segsen a ppeççem
Ibe$wviyen, s tidep, deg uâaqeb n Loahennama, ad wekkôen
Ur ipfukku fellasen. Nitni, degs, ad kkufferen
Ur ten Nednis, maca llan, nitni, d imednas
Ad necden: "a Malik, xas ad a$ Iqfeô Mass ik"! A d ini: "war ccekk, a pwellfem
Ni$ Nusa n $uôwen, s tidep, maca tegwti, degwen, keôhen tidep
Ne$ undin ticeôkep. Ula d Nekwni Neppandi
Ne$ $ilen ur Nsell ara i lesrar nnsen, akked tumlin nnsen. Ihi, imceggâen nne£, $uôsen, pparun
Ini: "lemmer illi mmi s i Uênin, nek d aâbad amenzu
Gedha s Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, Mass n usgeld, mgal ayen pxeôôiven
Anef asen ad nexxôen, ad uraren, alamma mmugren ass nnsen, i sen ippuwaââden
D Neppa ay d Öebbi deg igenni, d Öebbi di tmurt, u d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
Iôqa Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Iéôa melmi ay d imir. £uüôeS, ara tu$alem
Wid i la naâôen, war Neppa, ur $uôsen kra n ccafuâa, kkes ed inagan n tidep, u nitni éôan
Ma testeqûav ten anwa iten Ixelqen, a d inin, war ccekk, "d Öebbi". Ihi, acimi zzin akin
Timenna s: "a Mass iw! Wigi, s tidep, d agdud ur numin
Wexxeô asen, ini: "tifrat"! Deqqal ad éôen

Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uô Öebbi, Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
Di tmurt akked igenwan, s tidep, llan issekniyen i lmumnin
Di lxelq nnwen, akked wayen id Issefôuôex n lewêuc, d issekniyen i ugdud ipputebbten
Di lemgarda n yiv akked wass, akked wayen id Issrusu Öebbi n ôôeéq, seg igenni - Issidir yis tamurt, deffir tmeppant is -, deg udewwel n wavu, issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
D wigi ay d issekniyen n Öebbi; Nemmal ak ten, s tidep. Anwa ameslay ara amnen, deffir Öebbi akked issekniyen iS
A ssxev n yal akeddab amednub
Issemêas i issekniyen n Öebbi, qqaôen as ten, sinna, iggernen di tem$weô, amzun ur asen isli. Ihi, becceô it s uâaqeb aqeôêan
Ma illa wayen iwumi isla, seg issekniyen nne£, ad ittihi fellas. I widak, aâaqeb isdullun
Deffir sen Loahennama. Ur ten i$ennu s wacemma wayen kesben akked wayen rran d imawlan, war Öebbi. I nitni, aâaqeb abarar
Tagi d nnhaya. Wid iugin issekniyen n Mass nnsen, fellasen aâaqeb n daâwessu taqeôêant
Öebbi i Inuben fellawen s yill; ipcali, fellas, lbabuô, s lameô iS; a pnadim l$it iS. Amar a ppesnemrem
Inub fellawen s wayen akw illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt. Akw s$uôeS. S tidep, deg waya, d issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
Ini i wid iumnen ad semmêen i wid ur negguni ara ussan n Öebbi, iwakken ad Ikafi agdud $ef wayen keppben
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win ifalîan, mgal is. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen tu$alin nnwen
Ni$ Nefka, i At Isôail, Tazmamt, ûûwab, lambiyya. Nôeéq iten s wayen ilhan. Nesmenyaf iten i imavalen
Nefka yasen abeggen si Lameô. Ur mgarraden, armi i ten id tusa tmusni, wa iqheô wa. Ih, Mass ik ad Iêudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden
Sinna, Nebbwi k deg ubrid n Lameô. Ddu degs, ur teddu akked chawi n wid ur nessin
Ih, nitni ur ak d ppawin acemma s$uô Öebbi. Imednas, ih, d imawlan wa n wa. Öebbi d Bab n wid ipêezziben
Ayagi d assekni i l$aci, d nnhaya u d aêunu i ugdud ipputebbten
Ne$ $ilen wid imôôeôen iman nnsen s tucmitin, a ten Neêseb am wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d imuddiren ne$ d lmeggtin. Dir it uêuddu nnsen
Öebbi Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep, iwakken yal amdan ad ippuqeîîi af wayen ikseb. Nitni ur pwadensen
Twalav win irran lhawiyya s d ôebbi is? Itelf it Öebbi, asali $uôeS. Iskweô as ul, timejjin, Irra yas aâbôuq af allen is. Anwa ara t inhun, deffir Öebbi? Day u la tesmektayem ara
Nnan: "i illan kan, d tudert nne$, di ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir. Ad a$ in$en kan d akud". £ef ayagi, ur sâin kra n tmusni. Nitni $ilen kan
Ma mlan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, anamer nnsen, siwa mara d inin: "erret ed imezwura nne$, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "Öebbi Issidir ikwen, sinna, Ineqq ikwen. Sinna a kwen Issemlil ass n tnekra, ur illi degs ccekk". Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ass ideg ara d ias yimir, ass nni, ad xesôen ucmiten
A pwaliv yal lois $ef tgwecrar, yal lois ipwanced ar tezmamt is. Assa, a p$eltem ayen txeddmem
Tagi d tazmamt nne£, tessawal tidep fellawen. Nella Nepjerrid ayen akw txeddmem
Ihi, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Issekcem, Mass nnsen, s aêunu S. Wagi d rrbeê n ûûeê
Wanag wid ijehlen: "day ur awen $ôan ara issekniyen iW? Tesme$wôem iman nnwen, tellam d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi nnan: "ih, lemâahda n Öebbi, d tidep; imir, ur degs ccekk", tennam: "ur neéôi d acu ay d imir; $uône$ d nnwaya kan, ur nepputebbet
Ad asen d vehôent tucmitin xedmen, ad asen izzi wayen i$ef ttihin
Ad asen Inin: "assa, a kwen Neppu, akken teppum timlilit n wass nnwen agi. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi useîîaô
Ayagi, acku kunwi la tettihim $ef issekniyen n Öebbi. T$uôô ikwen tudert n ddunit. Assa, ur d teff$en segs". Ur isti$fiô êedd fellasen
I Öebbi annuz, Mass igenwan, Mass n tmurt, Mass imavalen
I Neppa akw ayen iufraren, di tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
